seyfert.notebook_helpers.misc module¶

seyfert.notebook_helpers.misc.get_subdf_for_bins(res, nbins, rows)¶

Function slicing the results dataframe to get the rows corresponding to the desired nbins and fishers. The FoM is added dividing it by the maximum value of the sliced dataframe.

seyfert.notebook_helpers.misc.get_subset_analyses_for_fishers(analyses, fisher_names)¶
